knit in 2 x 2 ribbing to create both the folded-over brim of the hat and also the body of the hat itself you then place four equidistant markers at which you will decrease every row to shape the top of the hat finally the yarn is cut and threaded through the remaining live stitches you have now finished your arvo beanie video tutorial here © 2025 hj ko this pattern may be printed and used for the working yarn is on the left hand needle to prepare for joining in the round to join in the round slip the first stitch from your left hand needle to your right hand needle the first stitch that you cast on is now the second stitch on your right hand needle lift the second stitch on your right needle over the first in order to place it on your left hand needle pull your working yarn tight place a bor marker you will begin knitting from your stitches that are on the left-hand needle hat body work in 2x2 ribbing until piece measures 26 30 cm / 10 12 then
